subject: Baseball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A foul ball that was mistakenly called out in the seventh inning bolstered a strong start by Phil Hughes, who rebounded Tuesday after a rough outing against the Atlanta Braves last week.
snippet: A foul ball that was mistakenly called out in the seventh inning bolstered a strong start by Phil Hughes, who rebounded Tuesday after a rough outing against the Atlanta Braves last week.
